mapper.insert: insert into tb_student (student_id, student_number, student_name, student_gender, student_tel, student_age, student_qq, student_wechat, student_major, student_department, student_user_id) values (#{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentWechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update tb_student set student_number = #{studentNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, student_name = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_gender = #{studentGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_tel = #{studentTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_age = #{studentAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_qq = #{studentQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_wechat = #{studentWechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_major = #{studentMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_department = #{studentDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_user_id = #{studentUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select student_id, student_number, student_name, student_gender, student_tel, student_age, student_qq, student_wechat, student_major, student_department, student_user_id from tb_student where student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select student_id, student_number, student_name, student_gender, student_tel, student_age, student_qq, student_wechat, student_major, student_department, student_user_id from tb_student where student_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select student_id, student_number, student_name, student_gender, student_tel, student_age, student_qq, student_wechat, student_major, student_department, student_user_id from tb_student
